Added “eLaisee” function in O! ePay. You can now send digital red packets with new year stickers to your O! ePay friends anytime anywhere!

•Newly added “Past 3-month Spending Records Enquiry Service”
•Collect the subsidy by tapping the Octopus card, and view the record of public transport expenses and subsidy amount, as well as the registration result of designated transport tickets

- Set up electronic Direct Debit Authorisation (eDDA), instantly top up your O! ePay account or Octopus cards from your bank account with Faster Payment System (FPS)

- The Daily Transfer Limit with FPS to an O! ePay account has increased to HK$3,000

A new Consumption Voucher Scheme-dedicated session will be launched to enable customers to review :
- Cumulative total “eligible spending”, spending records and vouchers details
- Register and spend to receive Octopus Top-up Value promotions
- Fabulous Octopus spending rewards with merchants and shopping malls
